title: Worker Nodes
test_description: Validate that the Databricks cluster has the required worker nodes configuration
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const clusterStep = stepResults.get_cluster_info; if (clusterStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from API', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes' }; } const apiOutput = clusterStep.data; try { const requiredNodeType = variables.iq_104_1_node_type || 'e32ds_v5'; const requiredWorkerCount = variables.iq_104_1_worker_count || 8; const clusters = apiOutput.clusters || [apiOutput]; let found = false; let failReasons = []; for (const cluster of clusters) { if (!cluster.node_type_id) { failReasons.push('Cluster response is missing node type information'); continue; } const nodeTypeMatches = cluster.node_type_id.toLowerCase().includes(requiredNodeType.toLowerCase()); let workerCountCorrect = false; let actualWorkerCount = 0; if (cluster.num_workers !== undefined) { actualWorkerCount = cluster.num_workers; workerCountCorrect = cluster.num_workers === requiredWorkerCount; } else if (cluster.autoscale && cluster.autoscale.min_workers !== undefined) { actualWorkerCount = cluster.autoscale.min_workers; workerCountCorrect = cluster.autoscale.min_workers === requiredWorkerCount; } if (nodeTypeMatches && workerCountCorrect) { found = true; break; } else { let message = 'Cluster worker configuration does not meet requirements:'; if (!nodeTypeMatches) { message += ` Node type is not ${requiredNodeType};`; } if (!workerCountCorrect) { message += ` Worker count is ${actualWorkerCount} instead of ${requiredWorkerCount};`; } failReasons.push(message); } } if (found) { return { status: 'pass', message: `At least one cluster has the required ${requiredWorkerCount} x ${requiredNodeType} worker nodes`, code: 'CORRECT_WORKER_CONFIGURATION', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes' }; } else { return { status: 'fail', message: failReasons.join(' | '), code: 'INCORRECT_WORKER_CONFIGURATION', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes' }; } } catch (error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Error processing cluster data: ' + error.message, code: 'PROCESSING_ERROR', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes' }; } }
